translation.OnboardingText01: Here, we will try to offer you the best and most facilitating tools to assist you.
translation.OnboardingText02: This application offers the possibility to organize and systematize the educational offering by institution, academic option, and location.
translation.OnboardingText03: We appreciate your vote of confidence. And remember: in case of doubts, our team will be available via online contact.
translation.OnboardingText04: Now, on the next screens, a brief tutorial will begin on the options within the application and how to use them.
